info.name: API Portal : Authorizations
info.description: This collections contains requests to test authorizations on the Portal API

item.name: applications
item.description: All anonymous requests to /applications/... should return 401

item.name: configuration & info
item.description: All anonymous requests to /configuration/.. and /info should not return 401

item.name: pages
item.description: Anonymous requests to /pages/... should not return 401

item.name: subscriptions
item.description: All anonymous requests to /subscriptions/... should return 401

item.name: tickets
item.description: All anonymous requests to /tickets should return 401
All anonymous requests to /users and /user/... should return 401

item.name: views
item.description: All anonymous requests to /views/... should not return 401
